Show / Hide Table of Contents

Interface IHost

Include this in your Host ModelSystemTemplate in order to unlock the XTMF Networking Sub-System.

The containing class will need to leave this as a public field/property for it to be setup properly.

Namespace: XTMF.Networking
Assembly: XTMFInterfaces.dll
Syntax
public interface IHost

CreateModelSystem(String, ref String)

Load a model system's structure from the model system repository

Declaration
IModelSystemStructure CreateModelSystem(string name, ref string error)
Parameters
Type Name Description
System.String name

The name of the model system to use
System.String error

The error generated while trying to load the model system
Returns
Type Description
IModelSystemStructure

null if that model system does not exist, or if it can not be produced and validated.
| Improve this Doc View Source

CreateModelSystemStructure(Type, Type, Boolean)

Manually create a new ModelSystemStructure Node

Declaration
IModelSystemStructure CreateModelSystemStructure(Type parent, Type nodeType, bool collection)
Parameters
Type Name Description
System.Type parent

The parent Type for this node
System.Type nodeType

The type this node represents
System.Boolean collection

If this node is a collection or not
Returns
Type Description
IModelSystemStructure

The generated node
Remarks

Please avoid doing this if possible since it will lead to hard coding. Instead please use the CreateModelSystem(string name) function.
